title: Make Your Vite Projects Fly with Nx
description: Vite is amazing. What's more amazing is Vite with Nx. And what's even more amazing is Vite with Nx Cloud. With Nx Cloud, your Vite projects will literally fly, with shared cache, distributed task execution, smart resource allocation, Nx Agents and our fantastic task Atomizer. A from-build-to-ship process like you've never seen before, Nx will...

title: Nx and Angular at Angular Enterprise Summit
description: Together with Jeff Cross, we presented all the latest updates about Nx and Angular

title: Build Editor Extensions with the Makers of Nx Console
description: You will leave this workshop having built and installed a custom VSCode and JetBrains extension! Learn how to enchant your Editor in a (seasonally witch-themed!) deep dive into Editor plugins and what it takes to build one. You will gain hands-on experience with Nx and how you can use it to compose a clean architecture in a complex repo.

title: Empowering Nx with AI
description: In this enlightening session, we'll unveil the pioneering integration of AI and ML within the Nx ecosystem. Discover how our cloud services are enhanced with intelligent algorithms to optimize performance and efficiency. We'll also take a peek into the Nx AI Assistant, our innovative tool designed to streamline navigation and utilization of Nx...

title: Elevating Your Monorepo: The Nx Transformation
description: Scaling your monorepo with Nx. In particular, talking about large Angular applications and how they can benefit from Nx

title: Angular and Nx Workshop at CityJS Athens
description: How to scale your Angular applications using Nx

title: The State of JavaScript 2024 | SAE Open Talk
